<title level="1" right="Rules">[Cryptid Adjustments](/Rules.aspx?ID=1711)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 58</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
They resemble the familiar creatures common to the world, but are always just a bit off. The following sets of adjustments can make ordinary creatures suited to be cryptids.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

text: Cryptid Adjustments Source Dark Archive pg. 58 They resemble the familiar creatures common to the world, but are always just a bit off. The following sets of adjustments can make ordinary creatures suited to be cryptids.
